thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Becky
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Becky

author: Becky
title: Becky
text: The delivery service this company uses is terrible, I wasn't home on their first attempt so a card was left, I then rearranged for it to be left with a neighbour the next day, again just a card was left, I then took the next afternoon off work to ensure I personally recieved the parcel, I was sent an email that morning to say my parcel was been help at their main depot. I ended up cancelling my entire order after still not having my items a week after purchasing. Won't use this site again.
